cast.name: 迈克尔·奥康纳 Michael O'Connor
洛丽萨·麦科马斯 Lorissa McComas

introduction: With a cast of the mid 90's most sought after softcore actresses, including Euro doll Diana Frank, voluptuous s/c veteran Lisa Comshaw, gorgeous Shari Eckert, and the late great Lorissa McComas headlining a cast with more than double that amount of gals willing to strip and have sex with an up and coming painter, the story of that same painter's "arranged marriage", to an about to be deported girlfriend of his landlord, becomes an afterthought. Did for me anyways lol. At any rate, this 1996 Playboy Entertainment release. Any film that the director decides it might be best to change his name on, is right up my alley so this Mike Marvin feature, directing under the name of Jake Kesey skinfest fits that bill to the T. Enjoy(机译)随着投90年代中期色情书刊女演员，包括欧元娃娃黛安娜·弗兰克，妖娆的S / C老将丽莎Comshaw，华丽的莎丽埃克特和已故的伟大Lorissa麦科马斯领衔铸造用一倍以上女生愿意以这一数额最受追捧的带材和有一个行动和未来的画家性别，同一画家的“包办婚姻”的故事，一个即将被驱逐他的房东的女朋友，成为一个事后的想法。反正没我笑。无论如何，这个1996年花花公子娱乐发布。该导演决定它可能是最好的上更改自己的名字任何电影，是对我的小巷，这迈克·马文的功能，在杰克·克西的skinfest名指挥适合该法案的T.享受
